quotes.quote: There is no common humanity versus a common machine intelligence. The alliances criss-cross — you have humans deliberately building certain types of machines that damage other humans.

quotes.quote: Large-scale problems do not require large-scale solutions; they require small-scale solutions within a large-scale framework.
quotes.author: David Fleming

quotes.quote: Those who use FLOSS self-consciously are overwhelmingly those who enjoy privileges like whiteness, maleness, and affluence. Lots more people benefit from this stuff as users of Firefox, WordPress, and LAMP servers, but huge portions of the economic benefit end up with shareholders of big companies like Google and IBM. These companies also help finance and sit on the boards of major FLOSS foundations. The result is products like Android, an operating system that employs Linux to carry out perhaps the most powerful engine of corporate surveillance ever invented.
quotes.author: Nathan Schneider

quotes.quote: If you are disgusted by what you see, and if you feel the fire coursing through your veins, then it’s up to you. You don’t have to be the leader of a global movement or a household name. It can be as small scale as chipping away at the warped power relations in your workplace. It can be passing on knowledge and skills to those who wouldn’t access them otherwise. It can be creative. It can be informal. It can be your job. It doesn’t matter what it is, as long as you’re doing something.
quotes.author: Reni Eddo Lodge
